projects.name: digiPant
projects.description: The project is based on the Norweigian/Scandinavian system of recycling bottles and cans. We wanted to find a way to change the way of recycling, so that the recyclingpoints didn't need to print your recipt on paper, but instead could get the recipt at your phone and the money right to your bank account. Therefore we made an app where it's posible to scan a code that the recyclingpoint is giving you, and then get the money into the app. The application is minded for smartphone usage, but it's a siglepaged webapplication at the moment. The plan is in the future to rewrite the code to React Native, a form that allows you to make a real phone application. Checkout link below to get your 'pante'-code.

projects.name: Boardgame Webshop
projects.description: This is a mockup of a webshop for boardgames, that me and a collegue created for the purpose of learning how to build a webshop. We've tried to set it up from A-Z, without the payment process though. The site is build upon Boardgame Atlas' API, where we've filtered out all the projects that didn't have a price. With the usage of Redux and local storage, we've managed to add items to the cart from different views and keeping them there when you refresh the page. This is my first project using Redux.

projects.name: Movie Database
projects.description: 'Movie Database' is a singlepage webapplication where you can add your own movies, rate them and give your own description. It's a project we had doing our education, which I've worked futher on afterwords.
